name: Advanced Battalion
description:
Push your troops forward to take out the objective! But be warned, some areas will require sacrifice to move forward. Rank up and become stronger. Be careful who you sacrifice!

Control Pad Recommended

Left stick move

Right Trigger Shoot

Right Shoulder Swap Soldiers

A to Jump

Keyboard -

WASD movement

Space - Jump

Left Mouse - Shoot

E - Swap Soldier

R - Reset Game

C - Credits

ESC - Quit
